title: What will it take to dent this Teflon stock market? Here's how to invest, meanwhile.
text:
Netflix teases new seasons of ‘Ozark,' ‘Stranger Things,' ‘Bridgerton' at Tudum event

Netflix Inc. gave a glimpse into its future Saturday, releasing a slew of trailers and clips for upcoming releases, including new seasons of "Stranger Things," "Ozark" and "Bridgerton." See full story.

When the stock market pulls back, keep buying — especially these five companies

Sentiment has gotten too bearish. Consider shares of Microsoft, ConocoPhillips and Yum China. See full story.

‘I'm no hedonist' but I want to build our next home for retirement, my wife says no. We've saved $3 million. What should I do?

Have a question about your own retirement savings? Email us at HelpMeRetire@marketwatch.com See full story.

Viral TikTok accuses Zillow and others of manipulating the housing market. Here's what's really going on

No, Zillow isn't buying all the homes in your neighborhood. But the rise of so-called iBuyers does raise regulatory questions. See full story.

MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE

In this week's Extra Credit we also talk staffing shortages at the biggest consumer lender in the country See full story.
